Texts.Eng: Find the ^orange;artifact^reset; in the ^orange;old Glitch keep^reset;
I have received coordinates for ^orange;The Baron's Keep^reset;. ^green;Use the ship computer^reset; to access the location.
I'm so proud of you! After all you've done, I know that you're equal to the challenge we face. And as for the woman you fought again... ^orange;My old journal^white; might give you some answers.
The ^orange;Glitch artifact^reset; is in a castle, under the care of a certain, slightly odd, Glitch. ^green;Would you go to his keep and talk to him^reset;, dear?
